name: Dungeon Twins Adventure
description:
Welcome to Dungeon Twins Adventure ! 

Game made with Godot 3.5 for the Abyssal's Pixel Game Jam #5

Two players move in a 2D world and need to open caves to continue.  Travels 8 Worlds for face the boss and try to escape him !

Enjoy play and give us back your feeling in comment !

Creators - TPGame

Stopake & Petitrudy

Godot 3.5.1

Sprite : Fanatical RPG Pack 

Epic music : https://vhcmusic.com/ (From Fanatical RPG Pack) 

Some sound & Sprite from OpenGameArt

A lot of work ! :)
